item.title: Beignets
item.description: Beignets # Ingredients # 1/4 tsp. dry yeast 2 Tbsp. warm water; 105Â°F 2 Tbsp. granulated sugar 1 Tbsp. vegetable shortening 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 cup heavy cream 1/2 egg 2 cups (278 grams) all-purpose flour 1/4 cup boiling water Vegetable oil for frying Confectioner’s sugar for dusting Instructions # Sprinkle yeast over warm water in a small bowl, stirring to dissolve. Let stand for 5 minutes.
